                            int achievementId,

                              throws DatabaseException
        Adds an achievement to the PLAYERACHIEVEMENTS table.
        Parameters:
        PlayerId - The player id
        AchievementId - the achievement id
        value - details about the current completion of the achievement
        completed - a boolean value >= 0 (0 == false)
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • isComplete

        public int isComplete(int playerId,
             int achievementId)
               throws DatabaseException
        Returns a boolean value indicating if an achievement has been completed by a particular player.
        Parameters:
        int - playerId The player id
        int - achievementId The achievement id
        Returns:
        0 if achievement is yet to be completed completed, and any value if achievement has been completed already
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
